channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Resilient SOAR
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Resilient SOAR

item.title: CVE-2021-20566|2024-08-03T17:45:44.335Z -- ibm -- resilient%20soar
item.description: IBM Resilient SOAR V38.0 uses weaker than expected cryptographic algorithms that could allow an attacker to decrypt highly sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 199238.

item.title: CVE-2021-20567|2024-08-03T17:45:44.474Z -- ibm -- resilient%20soar
item.description: IBM Resilient SOAR V38.0 could allow a local privileged attacker to obtain sensitive information due to improper or nonexisting encryption.IBM X-Force ID: 199239.
